Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese delegation
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Chinese delegation
     Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) - General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the visiting delegation of the world affairs press of China.
 The gift was handed to an official concerned by president of the press Wang Chengjia who is the head of the delegation.

articles.title: Photo exhibition on anniversary of National Day of Luxembourg
articles.content:
Photo exhibition on anniversary of National Day of Luxembourg
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- A photo exhibition was held here on June 27 and 28 on the occasion of the 135th anniversary of the National Day of Luxembourg.
 After Kim Yong Ho, chairman of the Korea-Luxembourg Friendship Association, made a speech, members of the association and working people in the city looked round photos introducing Luxembourg.

Greetings to Algerian prime minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Algerian prime minister 
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a message of greetings to Ali Benflis upon his reappointment as prime minister of Algeria.
 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms and wished him greater success in his work for socio-political stability and economic prosperity of the country.    
 Meanwhile, foreign minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Abdelaziz Belkhadem upon his reappointment as Algerian minister of state and minister of foreign affairs.

articles.title: Greetings to President of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Democratic Congo
    Pyongyang, June 29 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on June 26 sent a message of greetings to Joseph Kabila, President of Democratic Congo, on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing belief that good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop in conformity with the aspiration and interests of the two peoples, the message sincerely wished the president, government and people of Democratic Congo greater success in the work for national unity, territorial integrity, peace and development.
